# SRPhotoplethysmogramSample.Usage

**Structure**

The possible ways that a person or the system may take a photoplethysmogram (PPG) reading.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Usage
```

## Getting the reading method

- **foregroundHeartRate**: A heart rate reading that a person takes while using an app.
- **deepBreathing**: A deep breathing sensor reading that a person takes while using an app.
- **foregroundBloodOxygen**: A blood oxygen reading that a person takes while using an app.
- **backgroundSystem**: A reading taken by the system in the background.

## Initializing usage

- **init(rawValue:)**: Initializes a PPG usage structure.

## Accessing PPG data

- **startDate**: The start date of the photoplethysmogram (PPG) sensor data recording.
- **nanosecondsSinceStart**: The time in nanoseconds since the start of the data recording.
- **usage**: The method that the person or system uses to take the reading.
- **opticalSamples**: The samples recorded by the photoplethysmogram (PPG) optical sensor.
- **SRPhotoplethysmogramOpticalSample**: A data sample from the photoplethysmogram (PPG) optical sensor.
- **accelerometerSamples**: The samples recorded by the photoplethysmogram (PPG) accelerometer.
- **SRPhotoplethysmogramAccelerometerSample**: A data sample from the photoplethysmogram (PPG) accelerometer.
- **temperature**: The samples recorded by the photoplethysmogram (PPG) thermometer.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
